title: Obsidian Security - Event Insights
description: This dashboard provides visibility into event logs, capturing activities within cloud services and detailing which actors performed actions on which targets.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides visibility into event logs, capturing activities within cloud services and detailing which actors performed actions on which targets.

For more information, see the [Obsidian Security](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/obsidian_security/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Events by Obsidian Derived Client IP Threat Level
